summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the licensing and regulating of solicitations of money or property, and solicitations for the sale of tickets or any article or thing for purpose of charity, relief or benefit; defining offenses; providing penalties, and amending Ordinance No. 48022 (the License Code), as amended, by adding thereto four (4) additional sections, numbered 276, 277, 278 and 279 and declaring an emergency.
